snippet.title: Militsioner - Official Trailer | Day of the Devs: The Game Awards Edition Digital Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
Join Dmitry Shevchenko from developer TallBoys for a deep dive into Militsioner, an upcoming first-person surreal immersive runaway simulator game. Take a look at gameplay, and town exploration, and learn about the story set up where the player is a wrongly-accused civilian attempting to flee a city under the watchful eye of a giant policeman. The trailer mixes healthy doses of absurdity, horror, and political commentary, with players able to take advantage of a “Tamagotchi-like mood system” to interact with anyone in the city…including the giant policeman.

#IGN #Gaming
